value.name: North Carolina motorist charged with striking 2 Andrew Brown Jr. protesters

value.name: NC city where Andrew Brown Jr. killed backs BLM street art | Charlotte Observer
value.description: A Black Lives Matter mural could be painted outside a public safety building in the town where North Carolina deputies shot and killed Andrew Brown Jr. During a City Council meeting on Monday, elected leaders in Elizabeth City voted 5-1 to task the city manager with finding someone to create street art on the pavement.
